title: What are the features of the OnePlus 9 Pro? - Quora

response.answer_text: Snapdragon 875 SoC. Five rear camera setup. 20GB DDR5 RAM. In-display fingerprint sensor. In-display front camera. 1TB UFS 4.1 storage. 6500 mAh battery with 55W Charger in the box. 20 layer liquid cooling system. 7.2 inches Super-fluid Amoled display with a 180Hz refresh rate. 99% screen to body ratio.
